Summary: Slow moving no sound fireball circle a pair.
divs: Sighting Detailscame home from work arriving aprox 10:05pm went to the back patio to smoke a cicarette it was a full moon clear skies was staring at the moon a circle object appeared instantly was dumbfounded and amazed i knew it wasnt something i ever seen before i smoke outside afterwork about the same time never seen something that behaved like this no sound then all of sudden another one appeared now they were travelling in pairs i got really excited woke my girl friend out of bed they were headed from south to north towards my directions my girlfriend witnessed it then all of sudden one of them just disappeared while the other one just flew over my neighborhood very slow with no sound stood outside for another 15 min after it left my sight, i heard fast moving aircraft heading the same direction i first saw these things just appeared and one just disappeared was searching the intenet if anyone saw the same in brandon or was there some sort explanation for this...thanks left name number if anyone has additional info...
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brandon
There were no other sightings in Brandon on or around April 27th 2010
